xocs:funding-list.xocs:funding-text: This work is supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China under grants 62176112 , the Natural Science Foundation of Shandong Province under grant ZR2020MA053 , ZR2022MA030 , and the Discipline with Strong Characteristics of Liaocheng University–Intelligent Science and Technology under grant 319462208.

affiliation.ce:source-text: School of Mathematical Science, Liaocheng University, Liaocheng 252000, PR China

head.citation-title: Color image watermarking based on a fast structure-preserving algorithm of quaternion singular value decomposition
head.abstracts: Â© 2023This paper presents a new color image watermarking algorithm based on a fast structure-preserving algorithm of quaternion singular value decomposition (QSVD). We first propose F structure-preserving algorithm of QSVD by using quaternion Householder transformation, then apply it to color image watermarking, finally compare it with other algorithms and get better invisibility, security and almost robustness.

grant-text.$: This work is supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China under grants 62176112, the Natural Science Foundation of Shandong Province under grant ZR2020MA053, ZR2022MA030, and the Discipline with Strong Characteristics of Liaocheng University–Intelligent Science and Technology under grant 319462208.

coredata.dc:description: This paper presents a new color image watermarking algorithm based on a fast structure-preserving algorithm of quaternion singular value decomposition (QSVD). We first propose F structure-preserving algorithm of QSVD by using quaternion Householder transformation, then apply it to color image watermarking, finally compare it with other algorithms and get better invisibility, security and almost robustness.
coredata.dc:title: Color image watermarking based on a fast structure-preserving algorithm of quaternion singular value decomposition
